p: Data from the literature studies included in the present risk assessment were retrieved, summarised and arranged, based on the following criteria: 1) chemical composition of constituents of A. muricata and of the derived herbal preparations, 2) human studies, 3) acute, subchronic and chronic toxicological animal studies, 4) inÂ vitro studies, and 5) potential pharmakokinetic and pharmacodynamic interaction.
